channel.title: Need Help!
channel.description:
When ever i download.. say..TestScape .. When its downloaded.. it comes up with.. ''open with Internet Explorer'' And below it, it sais, ''save to disk''.. i think open with is a better choice.. so i click that and then the internet browser opens, then closes, and this comes up ''[b]Do you want to save this file ? [/b] and i have a choice of ''Open, Save,And Cancel'' i tried save and open.. neither work.. they both come up witht the same thing , except when i save , it goes to my documents, then i open it there, and the same happens.
What do i do??

item.title: Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

The testscape source may be in a .rar or a .zip in which case you should go download either winrar or winzip depending on which one (although either one will open the other). And try saving the file instead of just opening it. If that doesn’t work, then download firefox. the download manage is much simpler.

Read full topic
